Name: Name Change, Firefighter Christopher J. Siedenberg Memorial Park, Staten Island
Title: A Local Law in relation to a park name, Firefighter Christopher J. Siedenberg Memorial Park, Borough of Staten Island.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following park name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


	New name			Present name			Limits

Firefighter Christopher J. 	Evergreen Park	a park bounded by Greaves Lane, 
Siedenberg Memorial Park	Greaves Avenue, Dewey Avenue and Evergreen Street contained in Block 4500, Lots 425, 500, 537 and 538 in the borough of Staten Island

______________________________________________________________________________	
      
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
